description: Demolition of an existing garage, erection of part two storey/part single storey side, single storey rear extension. Hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer and installation of 3nos front rooflignts.
decision_conditions: Due to the submission of inconsistent and contradictory plans, Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development on the character and appearance  of the host dwelling or the immediate surrounding area. The application has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of of cogent information, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact in terms of character and appearance, in conflict with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012).

Due to the submission of inconsistent and contradictory plans, Officers are unable to fully assess the impact on daylight of  the proposed development on neighbouring no 24 The Roystons. The application has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of of cogent information, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact in terms of character and appearance, in conflict with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012).
